title: 監獄插件問題
author: Danking
txt_content:
http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/jail/

如何使用監獄玩家後, 玩家在的名子直接變成
<[囚犯xxxx>

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
大致看了一下这个插件,没有发现有前缀的功能;
那么就手动加吧,把修改前缀的命令和jail命令绑在一起,修改commands.yml就可以了;
输入jail的时候自动改前缀,解除jail的时候自动去掉前缀;
# This is the commands configuration file for Bukkit.
# For documentation on how to make use of this file, check out the Bukkit Wiki at
# http://wiki.bukkit.org/Commands.yml
# 
# If you need help on this file, feel free to join us on irc or leave a message
# on the forums asking for advice.
# 
# IRC: #spigot @ irc.spi.gt
#    (If this means nothing to you, just go to http://irc.spi.gt/iris/?nick=&channels=spigot )
# Forums: http://www.spigotmc.org/forums/help.40/
# Bug tracker: http://www.spigotmc.org/forums/bugs-feature-requests.8/

command-block-overrides: []
aliases:
  icanhasbukkit:
  - version $1-
 命令别名:   #这里你自己取名字(支持中文,但是要改ansi格式编码),尽量不要和已有的命令重复.
  - jail $$1 $2-   #这里是监狱命令jail [player name] (time) m j:(Jail name) c:(Cell name) r:"(Reason)"  
  - manuaddv $$1 prefix [囚徒]  #这里是改前缀

命令别名啊,就是你以后输入的指令啊;
那上面的例子来说就是输入icanhasbukkit balabala就等于输入version balabala

怎麼用?
